text: The Apple I is a simple, 8-bit Personal computer and was the first official product of the company, Apple Inc. It was designed by Steve Wozniak in 1976 as a simple computer board. Steve Jobs saw the computer board and decided to make a company called Apple Computer to sell it for $666.66. They ended selling up around 200 units and it was succeeded by the Apple II. Category:Apple hardware
title: Apple I
